00001 //***************************************************************************//
00002 //
00003 // TItemList Class
00004 //
00005 // It is the internal class which stores List Items in the Map.
00006 //
00007 // In most cases, there is no need to modify or use this class directly
00008 // within your Application.
00009 //
00010 //***************************************************************************//
00011 
00012 #ifndef TITEMLIST_H
00013 #define TITEMLIST_H
00014

00020 #define QVARIANT_COMPARE(a,b) (a == b && b == a)
00021 //#define QVARIANT_COMPARE(a,b) (a == b)

00023 //***************************************************************************//

00032 class TItem 
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     QVariant    value;  
00036     QIcon       *icon;  
00037     QString     text;   
00038 };
00039 
00040 //***************************************************************************//
00041 
00042 typedef QPair<QString, QVariant> ITEM;

00087 
00092     virtual TItem*  findItem(const QVariant &_value);
00093 
00098     virtual TItem*  findItemByText(const QString &_text);
00099 
00109     TItemList& operator<<(const QString &_text);
00110

00121 
00122

00164 
00165 
00174     virtual bool paintComboItem(QPainter *painter, QStyleOptionViewItem &option, const QModelIndex &index,
00175         QVariant &data) 
00176     { return true; }
00177 
00182     virtual bool compareComboItem(const QVariant &list_value, const QVariant &item_value) 
00183     { return list_value == item_value; }
00184 
00194     virtual void highlightComboItem(QVariant &data, int index, class QComboBox *box, QPoint hintPos) {};
00195 
00201     virtual QSize sizeHintComboItem (QVariant &data, const QStyleOptionViewItem & option) const { return QSize(); }
